data.name: Descopera.ro Dark Theme
data.description:
A night mode experience for the website www.descopera.ro.

Tema intunecata pentru site-ul www.descopera.ro.

data.name: DuckDuckGo - End of Eva
data.description: Just replaces the background with EoE background, and removes duckduckgo logo.

data.name: 百度文库clean
data.description:
2020-05-20 百度文库(wenku.baidu.com) 界面精简：
1.精简文档页面显示内容，去除与文档阅读下载无关的推广、分享、购买、VIP界面；
2.文库搜索页面去边栏，搜索内容居中显示；
3.文库首页、个人中心、云知识、下载页面精简；
4.(在使用adp默认规则的前提下)去除少量漏网的广告。

data.name: Pronote flex
data.description:
Pronote est complètement réarrangé: le menu, le corps...
Changement principal: une barre de défilement est beaucoup plus agréable à utiliser

L'apparence ne change pas radicalement mais elle est tout de même plus agréable à utiliser
Le style s'applique uniquement aux sites XXXXXXXw.index-education.net (pronote) car index-eduction.net (hors pronote) redirige vers index-education.com donc il n'est pas affecté

data.name: Fiverr - Dark Theme 2020 by KaduFerraz v0.1
Typeracer: Modern Re:work
data.description:
This is a complete rework of the site made in a dark theme with subtle contrasts. Everything here is done by me except the play section, done by Kathy Chiang. 
I suggest you to go to his userstyles page to download his theme if you like light themes: https://userstyles.org/styles/145865/typeracer-modern-v3

If you wanna suggest or comment something, open a discussion here or message me in TypeRacer:
https://data.typeracer.com/pit/profile?user=miakai

data.name: Allegro - dark
data.description: Ciemny motyw Allegro: dodatkowo usuwa reklamy, informację o ciasteczkach oraz popup o Ratach PayU

data.name: Rainloop Dark V1.0
data.description:
A dark version of the Rainloop Web Email client. See https://www.rainloop.net/

NOTE: Change the domain (yourdomain.com) at the top of the CSS to match your own!

data.name: Spiegel Online (Anti-Adblock-Killer)
data.description: Hide (anti) Adblock nag screen on „Spiegel“ (formerly known as „SpiegelOnline“) [spiegel.de].
